title: New: Hozier – From Eden
content:
Premiered on Zane Lowe’s show earlier tonight, From Eden is taken from Hozier’s new EP out 31st March.

Following on from the resounding success of last years single Take Me To Church, 2014 will see Hozier take in the festival circuit, with dates at Leeds/Reading Festival and SXSW already announced. Practically written for the performing circuit, From Eden is just another string in his bow for what will surely be a captivating live set.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
